description: J.K. Rowling is the British author who created the popular and critically acclaimed Harry Potter series (seven books published between 1997 and 2007),

31 July 1980, Godric's Hollow, West Country, England, Great Britain ;Harry Potter is probably one of the bravest characters to ever exist in the history of children's literature. Despite being brought up in a non-magic family for a major period of his early life, Harry went on to defeat one of the strongest dark wizards to ever have lived.
19 September 1979, England, Great Britain .Employee of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creature ,Minister for Magic

3 November 1959, Islington, London, England, Great Britain.Fleamont Potter (legal guardian) ,Euphemia Potter (legal guardian)
Between 1 September 1883 and 31 August 1884, Mould-on-the-Wold, England, Great Britain .job: Owner and Barman of the Hog's Head Inn

24 June 1995 (aged 17) Little Hangleton graveyard, England, Great Britain.Quidditch Captain,Seeker,Prefect,riwizard Champion
